title: Steve's Red Leicester pie
ingredients: ['Pastry', '265g plain flour', 'salt to taste', '85g butter', '25g lard', '3 tablespoons cold water', 'Pie filling', '450g Red Leicester cheese, grated', '1 small onion, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 teaspoons mustard', '3 eggs, beaten', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '1 egg, beaten']
